attributes.action: Guarantee Total Support for UK-Warriors & Give them What they Need & Deserve by 1. MATCHING UK-Warrior Resources to Operational & Training requirements. 2. MATCHING UK-Warrior Equipment to Operational & Training needs. 3. MATCHING UK-Warrior Wages that reflect their loyalty, dedication, commitment & countless sacrifices. 4. MATCHING UK-Warrior Allowances to work & conditions outside of H & S Regulations. 5. ENSURING that UK-Warrior Compensation Procedures for Injuries are Simple & Fair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
